properties.areaDesc: Russell; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Monroe; Southeast Carter; Blount Smoky Mountains; Unicoi; Wise; Johnson; Southeast Greene; Cocke Smoky Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 6 at 9:32PM EST until February 7 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
...Accumulating snowfall expected across the northern Plateau and
higher elevations of East Tennessee and southwest Virginia late
tonight and Friday...

.Cold air will spill into the region overnight behind a cold
front. Another storm system will also move northeast across the
area tonight and Friday. Widespread precipitation will develop
with the rain mixing with and changing to snow across the
Plateau, and higher elevations of east Tennessee and southwest
Virginia.

Snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches are expected with locally
higher amounts up to 5 inches possible across the highest
elevations of the Smoky Mountains.

* WHAT...Rain mixed with and changing to Snow late tonight. Total
snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches but up to 5 inches across
the highest elevations of the Smoky Mountains.

* WHERE...Wise and Russell Counties of southwest Virginia and far
east Tennessee Mountains.

* WHEN...From 1 AM to 4 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM EST FRIDAY
